## getFileAtRef() function

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Gets the file content at a specific git ref.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getFileAtRef(filePath: string, ref: string, cwd: string): string | null;
```

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

filePath


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

Absolute path to the file


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

ref


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

Git ref to get the file from


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

cwd


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The working directory


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

string \| null

The file content, or null if file doesn't exist at that ref
